name: @porsche-design-system/js
author: Dr. Ing. h.c. F. Porsche AG

scripts.start: if [ "$CI" != true ]; then PORSCHE_DESIGN_SYSTEM_DEV=1 yarn build; fi && yarn start:app
scripts.build: yarn clean:build && yarn build:environment && yarn build:lib && yarn build:replace && yarn build:app && yarn build:cleanEnvironment
scripts.replace: partial=$(node -e 'console.log(require("@porsche-design-system/partials").getPorscheDesignSystemCoreStyles())') && regex='<!--PLACEHOLDER_CORE_STYLES-->|<style>(p-[a-z-]*,?)*\{visibility:hidden\}<\/style>' && sed -E -e "s@$regex@$partial@" public/index.html > public/index.tmp.html && rm public/index.html && mv public/index.tmp.html public/index.html
scripts.test: yarn test:e2e && yarn test:vrt && yarn test:cbt
scripts.test:e2e: concurrently -k -s 'first' -n 'server,e2e' 'yarn start' 'wait-on -t 240000 http-get://localhost:8575 && ts-node --project tests/e2e/config/tsconfig.json node_modules/.bin/jasmine --config=tests/e2e/config/jasmine.config.json'
scripts.test:vrt: concurrently -k -s 'first' -n 'server,vrt' 'yarn start' 'wait-on -t 240000 http-get://localhost:8575 && ts-node --project tests/vrt/config/tsconfig.json node_modules/.bin/jasmine --config=tests/vrt/config/jasmine.config.json'
scripts.test:cbt: concurrently -k -s 'first' -n 'server,cbt' 'yarn start' 'wait-on -t 240000 http-get://localhost:8575 && ts-node --project tests/cbt/config/tsconfig.json node_modules/.bin/jasmine --config=tests/cbt/config/jasmine.config.json'
